meanings.meaning: on[at] the tip of one's[the] tongue

vlive.korean: [빨간 맛] [빙그르르 돌며 실패] - 호시 형... - 이거 그냥 청소하고 싶은 거 아니야? [Red flavor][Failed] - Hoshi... - Does everyone want to clean up? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.23 TTT #3 (Camping Ver.)
vlive.english: [Red flavor][Failed] - Hoshi... - Does everyone want to clean up?

vlive.korean: [청순하게 뒤를 돌며] 어? 왔어? [Looking back innocently] Oh, you're here? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓ xV] “섹시한 은우가 세상을 구한다” (아스트로:ASTRO)
전국을 돌며 콘서트를 했습니다. I've been holding concerts here. 듣기 View video 2PM : 나 오늘 생일이야 🎂
그리고 원을 돌며 다른 민속놀이를 곁들이는게 강강술래 입니다. And other traditional plays were played next to Ganggangsuwolrae. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : HIGHTEEN - 하이틴 '하이틴! 달에 가다!!'
vlive.english: And other traditional plays were played next to Ganggangsuwolrae.

vlive.korean: 가족들하고 회 먹을 때, 친언니랑 빙글빙글 돌며 놀았거든요. When my family went out to eat sashimi, I circled around the table with my sister. 듣기 View video LABOUM : [라붐] 오랜만에 소통방송 ♥︎
vlive.english: When my family went out to eat sashimi, I circled around the table with my sister.

examples.korean: The door swung open. 발음듣기 문이 빙 돌며 열렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
They walked around the lake. 발음듣기 그들은 호수를 빙 돌며 걸었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They walked around the lake. 발음

examples.korean: They joined hands and danced round and round. 발음듣기 그들은 손잡고 빙글빙글 돌며 춤을 추었다 Neungyule
examples.english: They joined hands and danced round and round. 발음

examples.korean: The road curves around [round] the monument. 발음듣기 도로가 그 기념탑 주위를 돌며 커브를 그린다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The road curves around [round] the monument. 발음

examples.korean: She merrily whirled the dizzying wheels of the dance. 발음듣기 그녀는 신이 나서 눈이 어지러울 정도로 빙글빙글 돌며 춤추었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She merrily whirled the dizzying wheels of the dance. 발음
